attributes.action: compel people making judgements or decisions about road issues to hold a valid licence to drive a motorcycle, car, medium goods vehicle and hold a recent qualification in cycling. It would be desirable that Prime Minister also require them to have experience of driving LGVs and Buses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to enable those whose decisions affect all road users to have wider experience to draw upon in making those decisions.
